channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Movavi Video & Photo Set - Create Awesome Content Easily
item.content:encoded: Let’s add professional-quality polish to your soon-to-be viral streams and vlogs. Make video editing easier when you get the Movavi Video & Photo Set Bundle. Unlock a curated collection of Movavi Video Editor 2025 courses, including the Good Game Pack and the Dynamic Transitions Pack. Add overlays, dynamic transitions, and timers, toy around with fancy intros and outros, and so much more. Learn top Movavi techniques taught directly by Movavi experts and help support the ACLU with your purchase.

item.title: Python: Build and Ship 2026
item.description: Build apps and beyond with Python
item.content:encoded: We’ve partnered with Zenva Academy to deliver the ultimate Python Bundle. Unlock amazing courses now: become a business mogul with SaaS App with Python - Stripe Integration, clean up with Web Scraping and Data Cleaning with Python, code with confidence with The Complete Python Functional Programming Course, and more. Build and ship software, apps, bots, and more with this ultra-powerful and user-friendly programming language and help support the next generation of creatives at code.org with your purchase!

item.title: Ultimate Game Development Course Bundle
item.description: Unlock the power of game creation
item.content:encoded: Love playing video games? Take your love to the next level and start creating your own games with a little help from Skillademia. Master multiple widely used creation engines with expert instruction from video courses like Unity 2D and C# Game Developer Course, Unreal Engine 5 Course: Create Games in UE5 & Blender, and Godot 2D Course: Mastering 2D Game Development. Take the hesitancy out of diving into new skills when you pay less and learn more—get the very best tech education now and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase.

item.title: MAGIX Ultimate Creative Bundle
item.description: Take your creativity to the next level
item.content:encoded: Are you ready to bring your creative projects to life? This bundle of audiovisual software tools from MAGIX is the first step! Whether you’re an aspiring director, a photographer with a vision, or a musician just waiting to compose the next hit, we’ve got the software you need to make it a reality. For the videographers out there, edit and enhance your footage like a professional with Video Pro X16. Organize your cherished memories or make a digital storyboard with Photostory Deluxe 2024. Lay down some beats and polish your sick jams with Music Maker 2024 Premium. Get all this and more—plus a few handy content coupons—for the low price of your choosing, and support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

item.title: 3D Artist Tools, Assets and Brushes Mega Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Calling all artists! Level up your toolkit with the hottest digital art assets and beyond from the pros at JRO Tools. This gigantic bundle features 50+ unique assets, brush presets, and helpful tools—wow your players with amazing details and give your settings unmatched realism with lived-in touches like hard-surface kitbashes, decals, overlays, and so much more. Create creatures, characters, cities, and beyond using JRO Tools’ amazing assets, and help support Save the Children when you shop with Humble.

Keys expire, redeem before June 19th, 2026.

item.title: Web Development: Beginner to Pro by Packt
item.description: Go from zero to hero in web development
item.content:encoded: We’ve partnered with the pros at Packt to deliver the ultimate video learning experience for budding web developers. Pay what you want for instructor-led video courses and learn the fundamentals of modern web development through a dynamic series of step-by-step lessons like ReactJS – The Beginner Masterclass, Full Stack Web Development Mastery Course - Novice to Expert, and much more. Level up your skills with expert instruction—and help support Safe In Our World with your purchase!

item.title: Hero Lab X Pathfinder
item.description: Take your adventures on the go
item.content:encoded:
Experience epic adventures on the go with the power of Hero Lab x Pathfinder! Unlock everything you need to create characters from the Pathfinder Second Edition Core Rules, Howl of the Wild, and more, including new feats, items, prestige classes, and player content from popular Pathfinder Adventure Paths. The value doesn’t stop there! New users at any tier, and current users who pledge $15 or more, receive 3 free months of Hero Lab Online standard services. Pay what you want today for +10 speed to your favorite Pathfinder campaigns with this amazing character creation software, and +100 good karma when you shop with Humble Bundle.

Keys expire. Redeem before Feb 17th, 2027.

item.title: Build your Wild West with Outlaw from KitBash3D
item.description: Welcome to the Wild Wild West
item.content:encoded: Calling all cowboys—we’ve partnered with KitBash3D to assemble a bundle of Wild West 3D assets! Their gigantic library of over 30,000 premium assets is crafted for artists, by artists, making it easier than ever to build worlds. Tell your tales of outlaws and desperados in a variety of game engines like Blender, Unreal, Unity, Maya, and more. Whether it's the setting for a daring train robbery or a rancher's gunslinging tale of revenge, create with the very best from KitBash3D and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete n8n and Automation Bundle
item.content:encoded: Automation feeling too rigid? Add flexibility to your workflows with The Complete n8n and Automation Bundle. n8n easily connects applications, databases, and APIs to quickly automate your tasks without extensive code. In a first-time Humble Bundle exclusive deal, learn how to use n8n to master lead generation automation for sales teams, build AI Agents with LLMs, streamline social media content, optimize your email marketing in Mailchimp, and so much more. Speed up your automation using the power of n8n, and help support Girls Who Code with a portion of your purchase.

item.title: Best of Humble Level Up: 5K World Building Assets
item.content:encoded: Build the game of your dreams in any setting or scenario with our Level Up: 5K World Building Assets Bundle. The possibilities are endless—this massive library has everything from medieval to cyberpunk, gothic to ‘80s-inspired styles. Bring life and style to your projects with assets that let you create specialized hospitals, atmospheric taverns, underground subways, and more. Don’t wait—grab this jam-packed collection of high-quality 3D assets today and support Child's Play your purchase!

item.title: The Game Audio Collection 1,800+ music tracks & 65,000+ sound effects
item.description: 65,000+ professional audio assets ready for production
item.content:encoded:
Calling all game developers and video creators! This massive audio bundle delivers 1,800+ high-quality music tracks and 65,000+ sound effects built for real projects and real pipelines. From dark fantasy scores for RPGs to punchy UI sounds, ambient soundscapes, and high-energy tracks for action and cinematic scenes, there’s music, sound effects and voice packs here for every style and genre.

All assets are created by experienced contributors from GameDev Market, giving you production-ready sound at a huge scale. Expand your audio library, speed up your workflow, and support Hello World when you pick up this bundle through Humble Bundle.

All of the software in this bundle is available DRM-Free via direct download.

License Terms: https://gamedevmarket.net/terms-conditions#pro-licence

item.title: Noise Alchemy SFX Bundle
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with the Noise Alchemy SFX Bundle. This curated collection features hundreds of royalty-free effects and genre-specific sounds like sci-fi voices, sword clashing, and more. Plus, Humble members gain exclusive access to a one-year subscription to Noise Alchemy, the number one online sound effect creation platform! Pay what you want for a massive concoction of can’t-miss SFX assets, and help support Music Will with your purchase.

item.title: ArchiMaster and Cadsoft Complete
item.content:encoded: Start planning, blueprinting, and designing like a pro with our latest 3D CAD bundle! Learn how to use powerful CAD software and take your grand design ideas from your imagination to the real world. This amazing library includes Cadsoft Personal Architect Online, ArchiMaster 3D Expert, and a curated collection of specialized ArchiMaster home and landscaping design add-ons. Pay what you want for everything you need to succeed in architecture and help support the American Cancer Society with your purchase!

item.title: Learn Godot in 2026 Complete Course Bundle
item.content:encoded: Are you curious about game creation? Learn to harness the power of Godot, the ultimate open-source creation engine, with our 2026 Complete Course Bundle! Pay what you want to access professional-quality game creation courses like Metroidvania with Godot - Unit 1 - Platformer Basics, Monster Collector in Godot - Unit 1 - Overworld, and more, all for a low price you choose. Make the most out of Godot and build any genre game you want—plus—a portion of your purchase helps support code.org!

item.title: Battle Hardened Game Asset Bundle by Hivemind
item.content:encoded: Customize your next big action set piece with the ultimate collection of battle-hardened game assets by Hivemind! Light up the sky with realistic gun effects and set the perfect war scene in any era of history you choose—get the Townsmith: Modular Medieval Town Megapack, Modular Military Base Megapack, Ultimate Spaceship System, and much more. Create the realism of war with the very best battle-hardened game assets and help support the miracle workers at Make-A-Wish with your purchase.

item.title: Top Notch Unity Assets by Chris West
item.description: Massive savings on breathtaking Unity assets
item.content:encoded: The Top Notch Unity Assets Bundle is here to help you create effortlessly. Streamline the development process behind your next project with a curated bundle of ready-to-use Unity assets by Chris West. Save time and money with beautiful and practical prefabricated asset packs like the Full Sail collection—the ultimate tool for realistic movement on sails and other cloth-like objects—and Texture Studio, the perfect rendering platform for clothing, buildings, and more. Pay what you want for the very best from Chris West and help support the Make-A-Wish Foundation with your purchase.

item.title: Learn Claude Code and AI Development in 2026
item.content:encoded: Pay what you want to add the newest coding skills to your toolbelt with the 2026 Claude Code and AI Development Bundle. Learn from specialized courses like Prompt Engineering for Programmers and Learn Vibe Coding with Cursor alongside your mainline Claude Coding lesson plan. Claude is an automated coding agent you can use to help create original code, check your work, and save you from spending countless hours overworking yourself. Harness the ultra-powerful techniques of this amazing Humble Software Bundle and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase.

item.title: Anyone Can Learn to Code
item.content:encoded: Interested in learning about the intersection of game development and the rapidly advancing technologies driving AI? This bundle of video courses from Mammoth Interactive will get you up to speed! Learn how to implement, manage, and optimize large language models like GPT with the cutting edge toolkit Ollama. Drill down on the basics of popular game engines like Unity, Unreal, and Godot, hone your programming skills in languages like JavaScript and Python, and much more! Pay what you want for this bundle of over 40 comprehensive courses and help support starlight children’s foundation with your purchase!
